name: Flying Animals wild Simulator
description:
Flying Animals wild Simulator

Enjoy the the Unlimited Adventure of Flying. Fly your favorite animal.

In this unique game you can flying crazy animals like army helicopter or plane. Play as Ultimate Flying real wild forest animal. It not a Shooting, Action, Racing, Puzzle, hunting, war, gunner, sniper, demolition, military, mystery type game but here first time you see this kind of flying simulator game.

Are you ready for unlimited flying animal adventure ?

Animal lost their path of forest now they need your help to find the jungle. Take command of Flying animal under the realistic environment & show your flying skill. You can fly different animals like lion, horse, goat, yak, elephant, fox, wolf, deer, rhino, bear.

If you like flying game than it is made for you. You can test your helicopter or fighter airplane pilot skills. It is about feeling amazing flying with animal wings. You can play with Futuristic animal in this game. All age person can play this game.

Feature
- Flying City & Hill area
- Realistic environment
- No. of animals
- Easy to control
- Amazing water fall
- Different atmosphere
